short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Cooperative Patent Classification (CPC) from Espacenet in Colour

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View Cooperative Patent Classification (CPC) from Espacenet in Colour.

Features include:
     * CPC in Colour - determined by level
     * Bookmark CPCs
     * Save indexes and CPCs for instant access
     * View based on level hierarchy 
     * Limit view to IPC only.
